<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Hojiko>Oh my...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Hey there, Segi-san. I'm happy to see you popping up from
that side. I was sure you hated me, so what brings you here?
\N<Segi>Uh, um... that is...

\N<Hojiko>Shopping, perhaps? I see, I see, the next match is coming up
soon, so you must need various things.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>But you know... if you wanted to sell supplies, you'd
understand, right?
\N<Segi>Th-that is...
\N<Hojiko>That is?
\N<Segi>I-I'm sorry... I'll come back again...
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Mr. Hojiko... um...

\N<Hojiko>Hey there, Ms. Segi. What can I do for you? Do you finally
need our supplies?

\N<Hojiko>But... you understand what it takes to buy supplies, right?
Are you prepared today?

\N<Segi>Of course... I'll pay with money. If Mr. Hojiko desires, I
can even pay extra...

\N<Hojiko>Stop joking around now that you've come this far. You're
here because you've made up your mind, right?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Do you remember what happened last time... in the arena? I
thought I was being quite generous with the terms then.

\N<Hojiko>But... if you keep this up, I might just change my mind, you
know?
\N<Segi>Then... that...

\N<Hojiko>Are you trying to deceive me again like last time? I can't
hold back with just my hands and mouth anymore.

\N<Hojiko>I sell goods, and the lady pays the price. It's a perfectly
fair and legitimate transaction, don't you think?
\N<Segi>...
I've made up my mind.
I'll go back as I am.
決意は出来た
\N<Segi>I understand...

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, it seems you've finally made up your mind. Sorry for
being so mean. I'm just a little stressed out.
\N<Segi>...
2_セギ27u

\N<Hojiko>Come on, this way. Hurry up? I even closed the shop just for
today.
\N<Segi>Um... what about your wife...
\N<Hojiko>No need to worry, she won't be back for a while today.
\N<Segi>But... still... even though your wife is here...

\N<Hojiko>My wife... huh. Sure, she's my wife, but now that you and I
have this relationship, I don't see much meaning in being
with that woman.

\N<Hojiko>Now that we're in this kind of relationship, I don't see
much meaning in being with that woman anymore.

2_セギ27a

\N<Hojiko>Well... hehe, it's finally time for some fun. So, let me
worship those big breasts of yours...?
\N<Segi>...

Hojiko approached Segi with a greasy face and gazed intently
at her ample breasts. Segi, perhaps out of disgust, kept her
head down and remained silent.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Have you made up your mind? If you don't listen to me, I
won't sell you the supplies, remember? And that would be a
problem for you, wouldn't it?
\N<Segi>That is...
2_セギ27b
\N<Segi>...Mmm.

Teasingly searching over her clothes for Segi's sensitive
spots, his unpleasant touch only intensified her disgust.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... You know what the right thing to do is if you want
me to sell you the supplies, right? You're an adult after
all, aren't you?
\N<Segi>Please stop.

\N<Hojiko>Why? What are you saying now? If you're prepared, then this
should be fine, right?
\N<Segi>Mm... it's disgusting... that's why.

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... You're very direct, aren't you? That hurts a little.
Don't say such things, we have a special relationship, don't
we?
2_セギ27c
\N<Segi>...!

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... Is this it? Is this where Ms. Segi's nipples are?
Did I hit the jackpot? Hehe...

Like a child, Hojiko fondled Segi's breasts over her
clothing. His interest and excitement heightened, flushing
his greasy face even more.
\N<Hojiko>Hehe... hehe...!

\N<Segi>Hojiko-san... I must say, I'm disappointed. I never thought
you would be this kind of person...

\N<Segi>Being forced to fight in the training corps... and made to
be enemies with the people of the town I was close to.

\N<Segi>I thought you were suffering from such conflicts, too. But
you're different. You seem to even enjoy and look forward to
this situation...
2_セギ27a
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Not entirely wrong. Well, I feel it's fate that my partner
turned out to be Ms. Segi. And I'm thankful to the Lyuda
folks for that.
\N<Segi>Being manipulated by Lyuda... how pathetic.
2_セギ27c
\N<Segi>Mm...!

\N<Hojiko>Well, men are all the same once you peel back a layer.
Surely your husband... Yuia-san is the same, right?
\N<Segi>That can't be true.
2_セギ27a

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, who knows. Well, talking about your husband when it's
just the two of us might be in bad taste.
\N<Segi>...
2_セギ27d

\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Hehe...! Ms. Segi, did you feel something just now? Your

\N<Segi>There's no way I would feel anything from this...

\N<Hojiko>Maybe thinking about your husband just now brought his face
to mind? But too bad, it's not Yuia-san who's playing with
those nipples, it's me.

\N<Hojiko>So... shall we check? If you're not feeling anything, it

2_セギ27e

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, well even if you say that. Alright then, it was the
deal from the start, so I'll just enjoy myself as I please.
\N<Segi>...

With excitement making his breath rough, his face was greasy
and shiny. Words no longer reached the man before her.
Segi's face showed anxiety, resignation... and disgust.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>You don't have to be so scared, okay? I'll be gentle. I
don't intend to hurt you.
2_セギ27f

\N<Hojiko>Wow... ah...!?

Segi's white and ample breasts were exposed. Hojiko couldn't
help but let out an absurdly loud voice at the sight.
2_セギ27g
\N<Hojiko>He... hehe... heheh!!
\N<Segi>Please don't look too much.

\N<Hojiko>Is it embarrassing to be seen by someone other than your
husband? But... I think they're very beautiful?

\N<Hojiko>Besides, we're at a point where we shouldn't be embarrassed
about seeing each other's bodies anymore, right?
\N<Segi>That's not true.

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... But still, what big breasts you have... Right now,
these breasts are all mine to enjoy...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Sorry sorry, I got a bit carried away. But it can't be
helped, right? No man wouldn't get obsessed if such things
were exposed right in front of him.
2_セギ27h
\N<Segi>Ah... mmh!?
\N<Hojiko>Hehe... It can't be helped, right...?
\N<Segi>No... I don't want this! This isn't what we agreed on...!

\N<Hojiko>What are you talking about? This is a deal. And I have the
upper hand, right? So it's only natural for me to make some
demands, isn't it?

\N<Segi>If you call this a deal... then please keep the promises you
made yourself!

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, you're so stiff. After all that's happened, it's too
late to be saying...
\N<Segi>A promise is... a promise...!

\N<Hojiko>Yeah yeah, I got it. Well, let's just get this over with,
shall we?
2_セギ27i
\N<Segi>Ah...!?

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, why are you so surprised? Did you really think that
just by looking, it would be over? Of course not... I'll be
satisfied when I say I'm satisfied.
\N<Segi>But you have a wife...! You must have... a conscience...!

\N<Hojiko>Huh, that's quite the accusation. I don't recall ever
telling my wife that I'm a paragon of virtue, you know?
\N<Segi>...You're the worst...!

\N<Hojiko>Hey now, I've always intended to be "kind" from the
beginning to the end, you know?

\N<Hojiko>In fact, I think you should be thanking me. Or did you think
it was only natural for me to sell supplies to your husband
without telling him?
\N<Segi>Grr...!

\N<Hojiko>So, with that in mind, I think you should really reconsider
what actions you should take from here on out, okay?
\N<Segi>Is that okay with you...? I'll scream...

\N<Hojiko>...I forgot to mention one thing. This place is actually
soundproofed. Even if you make a little noise, it won't be
heard outside, and you can't call for help.
\N<Segi>Wha...!?

\N<Hojiko>In other words, it's just the two of us in this world right
now. Opportunities like this are rare, so let's enjoy
ourselves.
\N<Segi>How low can you go...? Even your wife would...!

\N<Hojiko>Low? No, I just made a deal. I kept my promise and don't
think I've done anything wrong, you know?

\N<Hojiko>What will you do? If you really hate it that much, I don't
mind if you go home now.

\N<Hojiko>Or... will you keep me company a little longer? The choice
is yours, madam. Hehe...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>...Do as you please.
\N<Hojiko>That's good, yeah yeah, being honest is a good thing.

\N<Segi>But don't forget. I will never submit to something like
this.

\N<Hojiko>Sure sure, do your best, okay? What you think of me now
doesn't matter anymore.

\N<Hojiko>I'm just going to enjoy this body until the promised time is
up.
このまま帰る

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, hello Miss Segi. I'm a merchant too, so I keep my
promises.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, hello there Segi-san. You came to visit again today,
I'm truly blessed as a man.
\N<Segi>...Please don't misunderstand. I'm not here because...

\N<Hojiko>Any reason is fine by me. As long as you come here, that's
all that matters. Now, don't be shy and come on in? Let's
enjoy ourselves like we always do.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Hojiko>What's the matter, my dear? You don't seem to be into it.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Well... I'm more than satisfied just to see you willingly
spread your legs for me.
\N<Hojiko>Hehe, how is it? Does it feel good? Are you feeling it?
\N<Segi>...

On the shabby bed in the dimly lit room, Hojiko thrusts his
hips desperately and with satisfaction.

Segi watched Hojiko, who could be described as comical, with
cold eyes. Without letting out a sweet sigh, just staring
coldly on and on.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>You're as inscrutable as ever. I can never tell what you're
thinking.

\N<Hojiko>We're not strangers anymore. Trust me a little and talk to
me about anything, won't you?
\N<Segi>...
\N<Hojiko>Well, it's fine. That's part of your charm too.

\N<Hojiko>Anyway, about that matter... Have you thought about it?
About us becoming a family... you know?

\N<Segi>That absurd proposal is pointless... I have already told you
my heart will never change.

\N<Hojiko>Hahaha, 'never change', huh? But I wonder how long that will
last?
\N<Segi>What do you mean...!?

The moment Hojiko uttered those provocative words, Segi, who
had been staring into the void with cold eyes, glared back
at him.

\N<Hojiko>You see, Yuia-san is still imprisoned. If he's been
restrained for this long, it means the people of Ryuda are
prepared to go to extreme lengths.

\N<Hojiko>In that case, Yuia-san might be considering a divorce to
ensure that you and Riia don't suffer any consequences.

\N<Segi>My husband would never think of such a thing...! Even if he
did, I would refuse...!

\N<Hojiko>Don't get angry, just hear me out. It's a hypothetical
situation. But if it really comes to that, you and Riia
might have no choice but to rely on me, right?
\N<Segi>Even so... Neither my son nor I will ever rely on you...

\N<Hojiko>That's sad... Even though we're so compatible physically,
huh?
\N<Segi>Ah...ngh!?

\N<Hojiko>Hahaha, look at that, your face is melting. No matter what
you say, your body tells the truth.

\N<Hojiko>Listen, it's better for you to choose me over a husband who
can't satisfy your bodily desires because he's in jail.

\N<Hojiko>That said, I need to make some proper preparations before we
can actually be together. Let me know as soon as you've made
up your mind, okay?
\N<Segi>Wh-who would... make such a decision...!

It was then. Suddenly, from behind Segi... the sound of a
door opening came from the shop side.
\N<Man>Hojiko. Are you there? You must be there. Open up quickly.

\N<Hojiko>Oops... this isn't good. It's him again. He's so persistent
it's unbearable.

\N<Hojiko>And he always shows up when I'm with Segi-san... Some people
just don't know how to pick the right moment.
\N<Segi>Wh-what are you going to do...!?

\N<Hojiko>Ah, that's right. I just had a great idea? Yeah, it's a
stroke of genius if I do say so myself.
\N<Segi>...?

\N<Man>Hojiko, you're there, aren't you? I'm not free to wait
around, so show your face already.
\N<Segi>What... may I help you with?
\N<Man>Ah...?

The man's eyes widened in surprise at the unexpected
response. His previously assertive demeanor seemed to fade
away.
\N<Man>Segi-san... why are you here? Where's Hojiko?
\N<Segi>That... Hojiko-san asked me to, um, watch the shop for him.
\N<Man>...

The man's gaze was fixed on Segi, who was blushing and
breathing heavily. In the depths of his eyes, there was
undoubtedly a flame of desire smoldering.
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>So, um... what can I do for you?

\N<Man>Haven't you heard from him? I've come to collect money. The
money I lent to him.
\N<Segi>That... matter... Yes, I've heard about it...

\N<Segi>But... could you please wait a little longer? I will
definitely prepare the money...

\N<Man>No way, even if you ask me. After all, this is an issue
between him and me.

\N<Segi>I am well aware of that... but please, I beg you to
reconsider... please.
\N<Man>...
\N<Man>Then... can you take over the debt? You can't, can you?

After a moment of contemplation, the man taunted Segi with a
provocative smile on his lips.

\N<Man>You can't, right? You're a complete stranger, aren't you? If
you understand, then hurry up and call Hojiko for me.
\N<Segi>If that's what you wish...
\N<Man>...What did you say?
\N<Man>...

\N<Man>Segi-san, why would you go so far? Why are you siding with
him?
\N<Segi>That's because...
\N<Segi>Ah... ahn...!
\N<Man>...

In front of the man, Segi let out a sweet sigh. Someone was
moving behind her in small motions, which the man was quick
to notice but deliberately chose not to address.
\N<Segi>Nn...!
\N<Segi>I-I am his woman...
\N<Man>You're Hojiko's... woman?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Man>...
\N<Man>I see... Alright. If you say so, I'll wait a little longer.
\N<Segi>Thank you... very much.

\N<Man>But it can't be for free. That's only fair, right? You'll
have to take on some responsibility too.

\N<Man>Let's see... how about you give me the underwear you're
wearing right now? Can you do that?
\N<Segi>My...

\N<Man>Yeah, you need to show some resolve. You're his woman,
right? Then you should be able to do it, shouldn't you? What
do you say?
\N<Segi>...I understand...
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>...Here you go.

\N<Man>Yeah... certainly. But don't misunderstand me, Segi-san. I
only said I'd wait. And that's not forever.

\N<Man>You get it? This isn't enough. If you can't prepare the
money by the next time you come here...
\N<Segi>Mm... Ah... Yes...
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>I... understand.
\N<Segi>Then, when that time comes... how about this?
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>I... even with this... am confident.

\N<Segi>If... if I can't prepare the money by the next
opportunity... then please allow me to pay with this.

\N<Man>...It's a promise, okay? If you break it, you'll suffer a
terrible fate, you know?
\N<Segi>...I understand.

\N<Man>...Well then, I'll take my leave for today. But still... I'm
surprised to hear you're involved with Hojiko like that.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Man>I'll tell you now, I've always had my eye on you. If it
weren't for Yuia-san, I might have been more forceful.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Man>In that sense... it seems Hojiko did a good job. I don't
know how he did it, but I want to take a leaf out of his
book.

\N<Man>Hey, Hojiko. I know you're skulking around back there. You
owe Segi-san your life.
\N<Hojiko>...

\N<Man>But remember this, okay? This doesn't settle our score. I'll
be coming back soon.

\N<Man>Make sure you have the money ready by then, okay? If you
can't... well, you know what will happen, right?
\N<Hojiko>...

\N<Hojiko>Hehe... looks like he went back without any trouble. What a
guy, trying to threaten me over just not returning some
money.
\N<Segi>Haah... Haah...
\N<Hojiko>Hehe, thank you, Segi-san. That was some fine slutty acting.
\N<Segi>Whose fault do you think this is...

\N<Hojiko>Thanks to you, Segi-san, our relationship remains unknown to
the family, and I managed to postpone dealing with that
guy's money.

\N<Hojiko>Hehe, how about that? In exchange for pretending to be my
woman, I won't spill the beans about us to your family. I
think it's a brilliant plan, don't you?

\N<Segi>What brilliant plan... Your actions are nothing but those of
a coward...!
\N<Hojiko>Now, now, don't say that. I'm grateful to you, after all.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Hey, hey, cut out the rough stuff. She's precious, and she's

\N<Man>Like I care about that. So, how about it... madam, are you

\N<Segi>This time... I've come to realize...

\N<Segi>Not knowing whom to bow my head to... unable to move forward

for now.

love in front of the store the other day.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Hojiko>Of course, I'll do whatever I can for Yuia-san and Riia.

\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Hojiko>Tomorrow... let's talk with my wife together. We need to

\N<Segi>...Yes.
